Text: Yours Truly (Sublime with Rome album):  After embarking on their first US tour in 2010, Sublime with Rome signed with the record label Fueled by Ramen and went to work on its first full-length studio album.

<Text: Yours Truly (Sublime with Rome album):  Guitarist Paul Leary of Butthole Surfers, who co-produced Sublime's eponymous final album, produced it.>
